snippet.title: Sky Gamblers - Afterburner - Nintendo Switch Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Based on our groundbreaking tech and 10 years of experience we bring you the best modern jet fighter simulator on the Nintendo Switch.

30 PLANES
Unlock, upgrade and customize the weapons and defenses of 30 contemporary and futuristic planes. Paint your favorite jet fighter, customize patterns and badges for the ultimate looks.

SINGLE PLAYER CAMPAIGN
Enjoy a 15 mission campaign and untangle a story of bravery and treason. 

HUGE RECREATED COMBAT ZONES
Fly through huge areas with carefully recreated cities like San Francisco and Rio de Janeiro where danger is everywhere: skies are filled with menacing enemy jet fighters, the sea is crawling with heavily armed battleships and SAM sites are lurking within buildings or forests.

SKIRMISH & ONLINE MULTIPLAYER
Polish your aerial combat, targeting skills and evasive maneuvers, against AI in custom games and go face the challenge for online PVP or Survival Co-op in non-stop action games with to 7 vs 7 airplanes.
